title: Video Player
css: .videoContainer { width: 100%; height: 100vh; margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow: hidden; text-align: center; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; } video { width: 100%; height: 100%; } body { margin: 0; padding: 0; background-color: black; overflow: hidden; }
